Definition.WordDefinition: Cross Roads, PA (borough, FIPS 17416) Location: 39.82047 N, 76.57030 W Population (1990): 322 (115 housing units) Area: 4.9 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Cross Roads, TX (town, FIPS 17852) Location: 33.23063 N, 96.99406 W Population (1990): 361 (163 housing units) Area: 16.3 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water)

crossroads n 1: a community of people smaller than a village [syn: {hamlet}] 2: a crisis situation or point in time when a critical decision must be made; "at that juncture he had no idea what to do"; "he must be made to realize that the company stands at a critical point" [syn: {juncture}, {critical point}] 3: a point where a choice must be made; "Freud's work stands at the crossroads between psychology and neurology"
